text.author: Zach, Emma, Carrie and others (see URL)
text.title: How to Tell a Joke
text.summary: This section from a guide on how to tell a joke advises practicing but not memorizing jokes, knowing your audience to pick appropriate jokes, choosing material from your life, online or repurposing jokes you've heard, using a realistic but exaggerated setup your audience can relate to, followed by a surprising punchline and possibly an additional 'topper' punchline.
